Articles.Content: I was trying to make an automated starship landing and a problem arose. the starship fins are connected to the yaw action group and I'm trying to use a KAL controller for fins during landing. and because the fins are bound to an action group the fins won't respond to the KAL controller. how fix?

Moved to Add-on Discussions, I think.   If this is a stock game, we can move it somewhere else. 

What Starship mod are you using?

Its A Stock Starship Replica

Using Hinges For Flaps

3 hours ago, The Kerman said:

Its A Stock Starship Replica

Using Hinges For Flaps

 

Gotcha.   Moving over to gameplay questions then.

when you right click on the fin, there should be a menu where it says to which controls are tied - including pitch, yaw, roll. so you can deactivate those and it should work.

also, you may want to use a more informative thread title in the future
